title: B2B E-Commerce — Jugnu Tech Pvt. Ltd.
description: An SaaS-based eCommerce solution designed to facilitate sales and drive growth.
Built a user-friendly web portal and mobile app to streamline the order placement, invoicing, and tracking.
Revamped the web and mobile architecture, resulting in an 80% improvement in loading speed and a 60% reduction in app size.

title: Consumer Engagement System — Salesflo Pvt. Ltd.
description: Consumer Engagement System to enhance customer relations and increase sales promoter productivity by 80%.
Introduced Journey Planning functionality for optimizing sales promoter routes.
Enforced robust web security standards to prevent issues effectively.

title: Distribution Management System — Salesflo Pvt. Ltd.
description: SaaS-based distribution management system serving FMCG companies, both locally and internationally.
Efficiently managed a high volume of daily orders, invoices, and inventory items.
Created reporting tools and multiple reports, reducing report generating time by 80%.
